scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT *
  FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

transformations.name: SelectCategoryColumns
transformations.description: Renaming DimCategory to select1 with EnglishProductCategoryName, SpanishProductCategoryName, FrenchProductCategoryName'

content.query:
USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_customer') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_customer;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_customer(    
    [CustomerKey] [int],
	[GeographyKey] [int],
	[CustomerAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[Title] [nvarchar](8),
	[FirstName] [nvarchar](50),
	[MiddleName] [nvarchar](50),
	[LastName] [nvarchar](50),
	[NameStyle] [bit],
	[BirthDate] [date],
	[MaritalStatus] [nchar](1),
	[Suffix] [nvarchar](10),
	[Gender] [nvarchar](1),
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50),
	[YearlyIncome] [money],
	[TotalChildren] [tinyint],
	[NumberChildrenAtHome] [tinyint],
	[EnglishEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[SpanishEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[FrenchEducation] [nvarchar](40),
	[EnglishOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[SpanishOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[FrenchOccupation] [nvarchar](100),
	[HouseOwnerFlag] [nchar](1),
	[NumberCarsOwned] [tinyint],
	[AddressLine1] [nvarchar](120),
	[AddressLine2] [nvarchar](120),
	[Phone] [nvarchar](20),
	[DateFirstPurchase] [date],
	[CommuteDistance] [nvarchar](15) )
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimCustomer.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_customer'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_date') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_date(    
	[DateKey] [int],
	[FullDateAlternateKey] [date],
	[DayNumberOfWeek] [tinyint] ,
	[EnglishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchDayNameOfWeek] [nvarchar](10),     
	[DayNumberOfMonth] [tinyint],
	[DayNumberOfYear] [smallint],
	[WeekNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[EnglishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[SpanishMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[FrenchMonthName] [nvarchar](10),
	[MonthNumberOfYear] [tinyint],
	[CalendarQuarter] [tinyint],
	[CalendarYear] [smallint],
	[CalendarSemester] [tinyint],
	[FiscalQuarter] [tinyint],
	[FiscalYear] [smallint],
	[FiscalSemester] [tinyint])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimDate.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_date'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_date;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_employee') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_employee(    
    [EmployeeKey] [int],
	[ParentEmployeeKey] [int],
	[EmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[ParentEmployeeNationalIDAlternateKey] [nvarchar](15),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[FirstName] [nvarchar](50),
	[LastName] [nvarchar](50),
	[MiddleName] [nvarchar](50),
	[NameStyle] [bit],
	[Title] [nvarchar](50),
	[HireDate] [date],
	[BirthDate] [date],
	[LoginID] [nvarchar](256),
	[EmailAddress] [nvarchar](50),
	[Phone] [nvarchar](25),
	[MaritalStatus] [nchar](1),
	[EmergencyContactName] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmergencyContactPhone] [nvarchar](25),
	[SalariedFlag] [bit],
	[Gender] [nchar](1),
	[PayFrequency] [tinyint],
	[BaseRate] [money],
	[VacationHours] [smallint],
	[SickLeaveHours] [smallint],
	[CurrentFlag] [bit],
	[SalesPersonFlag] [bit],
	[DepartmentName] [nvarchar](50),
	[StartDate] [date],
	[EndDate] [date],
	[Status] [nvarchar](50),
	[EmployeePhoto] [varbinary](max))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimEmployee.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_employee'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_geography') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_geography;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_geography(    
	[GeographyKey] [int],
	[City] [nvarchar](30),
	[StateProvinceCode] [nvarchar](3),
	[StateProvinceName] [nvarchar](50),
	[CountryRegionCode] [nvarchar](3),
	[EnglishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchCountryRegionName] [nvarchar](50),
	[PostalCode] [nvarchar](15),
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[IpAddressLocator] [nvarchar](15))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimGeography.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_geography'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_geography;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product_category') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_category;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_category(    
	[ProductCategoryKey] [int],
	[ProductCategoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[EnglishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProductCategory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product_category'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product_category;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product_subcategory') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_subcategory;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product_subcategory(    
	[ProductSubcategoryKey] [int],
	[ProductSubcategoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[EnglishProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[SpanishProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[FrenchProductSubcategoryName] [nvarchar](50),
	[ProductCategoryKey] [int])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProductSubcategory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product_subcategory'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product_subcategory;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int] 1,               
	[ProductAlternateKey] [nvarchar](25) 2,
	[ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] 3,           
	[WeightUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 4,
	[SizeUnitMeasureCode] [nchar](3) 5,
	[EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 6,     
	[SpanishProductName] [nvarchar](50) 7,
	[FrenchProductName] [nvarchar](50) 8,
	[StandardCost] [money] 9,        
	[FinishedGoodsFlag] [bit] 10,
	[Color] [nvarchar](15) 11,         
	[SafetyStockLevel] [smallint] 12,
	[ReorderPoint] [smallint] 13,
	[ListPrice] [money] 14,
	[Size] [nvarchar](50) 15,
	[SizeRange] [nvarchar](50) 16,
	[Weight] [float] 17,
	[DaysToManufacture] [int] 18,
	[ProductLine] [nchar](2) 19,
	[DealerPrice] [money] 20,
	[Class] [nchar](2) 21,
	[Style] [nchar](2) 22,
	[ModelName] [nvarchar](50) 23,         
	[LargePhoto] [varbinary](max) NULL 24,
	[EnglishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 25,
	[FrenchDescription] [nvarchar](400) 26,
	[ChineseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 27,
	[ArabicDescription] [nvarchar](400) 28,
	[HebrewDescription] [nvarchar](400) 29,
	[ThaiDescription] [nvarchar](400) 30,
	[GermanDescription] [nvarchar](400) 31,
	[JapaneseDescription] [nvarchar](400) 32,
	[TurkishDescription] [nvarchar](400) 33,
	[StartDate] [datetime] 34,
	[EndDate] [datetime] 35,
	[Status] [nvarchar](7) 36))  
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimProduct.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_product'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.dim_sales_territory') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.dim_sales_territory(    
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryAlternateKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryRegion] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryCountry] [nvarchar](50),
	[SalesTerritoryGroup] [nvarchar](50))
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'dim_files/DimSalesTerritory.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = psv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/dim_sales_territory'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.dim_sales_territory;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.fact_internet_sales') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fact_internet_sales;	

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.fact_internet_sales(    
	[ProductKey] [int],
	[OrderDateKey] [int],
	[DueDateKey] [int],
	[ShipDateKey] [int],
	[CustomerKey] [int],
	[PromotionKey] [int],
	[CurrencyKey] [int],
	[SalesTerritoryKey] [int],
	[SalesOrderNumber] [nvarchar](20),
	[SalesOrderLineNumber] [tinyint],
	[RevisionNumber] [tinyint],
	[OrderQuantity] [smallint],
	[UnitPrice] [money],
	[ExtendedAmount] [money],
	[UnitPriceDiscountPct] [float],
	[DiscountAmount] [float],
	[ProductStandardCost] [money],
	[TotalProductCost] [money],
	[SalesAmount] [money],
	[TaxAmt] [money],
	[Freight] [money],
	[CarrierTrackingNumber] [nvarchar](25),
	[CustomerPONumber] [nvarchar](25),
	[OrderDate] [datetime],
	[DueDate] [datetime],
	[ShipDate] [datetime])
WITH ( 
        LOCATION = 'fact_files/FactInternetSales.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/fact_internet_sales'
    );

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM bronze.fact_internet_sales;

CREATE SCHEMA dwh
GO

CREATE TABLE dwh.product_agg
WITH   
  (   
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,  
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN  
  )  
AS SELECT * FROM staging.product_agg
GO

SELECT * FROM dwh.product_agg;

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'product' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dwh')
CREATE TABLE dwh.product
	(
	 [ProductKey] int,
	 [ProductName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [CategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [SubcategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	 [TotalOrder] bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestration

--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dwh.product
(ProductKey 1, ProductName 2, CategoryName 3, SubcategoryName 4, TotalOrder 5)
FROM 'https://ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/data/gold/product_agg'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dwh.product
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'data_ap203synapsestorage_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [data_ap203synapsestorage_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://data@ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE SCHEMA staging
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE staging.product_agg (
	[ProductKey] int,
	[ProductName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[SubcategoryName] nvarchar(4000),
	[TotalOrder] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'gold/product_agg',
	DATA_SOURCE = [data_ap203synapsestorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM staging.product_agg
GO

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_customer
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.customer') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.customer;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.customer
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/customer',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  g.[Country Name], 
  g.[Region], 
  g.[Group],
  YEAR(CAST(s.[OrderDate] AS date)) AS [Order Year], 
  SUM(s.[OrderQuantity]) as [Total Order], 
  SUM(s.[SalesAmount]) as [Total Revenue]
FROM 
  silver.fact_internet_sales s
JOIN  silver.dim_customer c ON c.[CustomerKey] = s.[CustomerKey]
JOIN  silver.dim_geography g ON g.[GeographyKey] = c.[GeographyKey]
GROUP BY g.[Country Name], g.[Region], g.[Group],YEAR(CAST(s.[OrderDate] AS date));

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_customer;
SELECT * FROM gold.customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_employee
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.employee') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.employee;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.employee
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/employee',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  e.[EmployeeKey], 
  e.[SalesTerritoryKey], 
  e.[Title], 
  e.[MaritalStatus], 
  e.[Gender], 
  e.[DepartmentName],
  g.[Country Name], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryRegion] as [Region], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryGroup] as [Group] 
FROM 
  silver.dim_employee e
LEFT JOIN  silver.dim_geography g ON g.[SalesTerritoryKey] = e.[SalesTerritoryKey];

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_employee;
SELECT * FROM gold.employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_product
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.product
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT 
    s.[ProductKey],
    SUM(s.[OrderQuantity]) as [Total Orders],
    p.[EnglishProductName] as [ProductName],
    p.[EnglishProductCategoryName] as [CategoryName],
    p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName] as [SubcategoryName]
FROM silver.fact_internet_sales s
LEFT JOIN silver.dim_product p
ON s.[ProductKey] = p.[ProductKey]
GROUP BY s.[ProductKey],p.[EnglishProductName],p.[EnglishProductCategoryName],p.[EnglishProductSubcategoryName];

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_product;
SELECT * FROM gold.product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.sp_gold_sales
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('gold.sales') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.sales;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.sales
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'gold/sales',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  SUM(SalesAmount) as [Total Revenue],
  SUM(ProductStandardCost) as [Total Cost],
  SUM(SalesAmount)-SUM(ProductStandardCost) as [Profit],
  SUM(SalesAmount)-SUM(ProductStandardCost)/SUM(SalesAmount) as [Profit Margin %],
  COUNT(DISTINCT(CustomerKey)) as [Total Customers],
  COUNT(*) as [Total Transaction]
FROM 
  silver.fact_internet_sales;

END;

EXEC gold.sp_gold_sales;
SELECT * FROM gold.sales;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_customer
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_customer') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_customer;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_customer
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_customer',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [CustomerKey], 
  [GeographyKey], 
  CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) as [Customer Name], 
  [BirthDate], 
  CASE WHEN MaritalStatus = 'M' THEN 'Married' WHEN MaritalStatus = 'S' THEN 'Single' END as MaritalStatus, 
  CASE WHEN Gender = 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN Gender = 'F' THEN 'Female' END AS Gender 
FROM bronze.dim_customer;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_customer;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_customer;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_date
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_date') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_date;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_date
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_date',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [DateKey], 
  [FullDateAlternateKey], 
  [EnglishDayNameOfWeek], 
  [EnglishMonthName], 
  [CalendarYear], 
  [MonthNumberOfYear] 
FROM bronze.dim_date;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_date;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_date;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_employee
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_employee') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_employee;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_employee
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_employee',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [EmployeeKey], 
  [SalesTerritoryKey], 
  CONCAT(firstname, ' ', lastname) as [Employee Name], 
  [Title], 
  CASE WHEN MaritalStatus = 'M' THEN 'Married' WHEN MaritalStatus = 'S' THEN 'Single' END as MaritalStatus, 
  CASE WHEN Gender = 'M' THEN 'Male' WHEN Gender = 'F' THEN 'Female' END AS Gender, 
  [DepartmentName] 
FROM bronze.dim_employee;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_employee;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_employee;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_geography
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_geography') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_geography
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_geography',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [GeographyKey], 
  [City], 
  [EnglishCountryRegionName] AS [Country Name], 
  [SalesTerritoryRegion] AS [Region], 
  [SalesTerritoryGroup] AS [Group], 
  [PostalCode], 
  g.[SalesTerritoryKey] 
FROM 
  bronze.dim_geography g 
  JOIN bronze.dim_sales_territory t ON g.SalesTerritoryKey = t.SalesTerritoryKey;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_geography;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_geography;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_dim_product
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.dim_product') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.dim_product(    
	[ProductKey] [int],
  [ProductSubcategoryKey] [int] , 
  [EnglishProductName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [Color] [nvarchar](15),
  [ModelName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [Status] [nvarchar](400), 
  [StandardCost] [nvarchar](10),
  [ProductCategoryKey] [nvarchar](10), 
  [EnglishProductCategoryName] [nvarchar](50), 
  [EnglishProductSubcategoryName] [varchar](50))
WITH ( 
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/dim_product',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_dim_product;
SELECT * FROM silver.dim_product;

USE sales_ldw;
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.fact_internet_sales') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales;



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.fact_internet_sales
    WITH
    (
        DATA_SOURCE = sales_data_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/fact_internet_sales',
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
AS
SELECT
  [ProductKey], 
  [OrderDateKey], 
  [CustomerKey], 
  [SalesTerritoryKey], 
  [SalesOrderNumber], 
  [SalesOrderLineNumber], 
  [OrderQuantity], 
  [ProductStandardCost], 
  [SalesAmount], 
  CAST([OrderDate] AS date) AS OrderDate,
  YEAR([OrderDate]) AS Year,
  Month([OrderDate]) AS Month
FROM 
  bronze.fact_internet_sales;

END;

EXEC silver.sp_silver_fact_internet_sales;
SELECT * FROM silver.fact_internet_sales;

COPY INTO dwh.trip_data_green_agg_copy
FROM 'https://synapsedataset.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi-data/gold/trip_data_green_agg'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,AUTO_CREATE_TABLE = 'ON'
)
GO

CREATE TABLE dbo.DimCustomer
(
    CustomerKey INT IDENTITY NOT NULL,
    CustomerAlternateKey NVARCHAR(15) NULL,
    CustomerName NVARCHAR(80) NOT NULL,
    EmailAddress NVARCHAR(50) NULL,
    Phone NVARCHAR(25) NULL,
    StreetAddress NVARCHAR(100),
    City NVARCHAR(20),
    PostalCode NVARCHAR(10),
    CountryRegion NVARCHAR(20)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = REPLICATE,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE dbo.FactSales
(
    OrderDateKey INT NOT NULL,
    CustomerKey INT NOT NULL,
    ProductKey INT NOT NULL,
    StoreKey INT NOT NULL,
    OrderNumber NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    OrderLineItem INT NOT NULL,
    OrderQuantity SMALLINT NOT NULL,
    UnitPrice DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    Discount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    Tax DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    SalesAmount DECIMAL NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(OrderNumber),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE TABLE dbo.StageProduct
(
    ProductID NVARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    ProductName NVARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    ProductCategory NVARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
    Color NVARCHAR(10),
    Size NVARCHAR(10),
    ListPrice DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    Discontinued BIT NOT NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
);

CREATE DATABASE sales_db;
--DROP DATABASE sales_db;

USE sales_db;
ALTER DATABASE sales_db COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data_dimension
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE sales_data_dimension
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://data@ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/dim_files'
)

--DimDate.csv
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimDate.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data_dimension',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        DateKey INT 1,
        FullDateAlternateKey DATE 2, 
        EnglishDayNameOfWeek VARCHAR(10) 4, 
        EnglishMonthName VARCHAR(10) 10, 
        CalendarYear SMALLINT 15, 
        MonthNumberOfYear TINYINT 13

    )
    AS [result];


--DimCustomer.csv
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'DimCustomer.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'sales_data_dimension',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '|',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        CustomerKey INT 1,
        GeographyKey INT 2,
        firstname VARCHAR(50) 5,
        lastname VARCHAR(50) 7,
        BirthDate DATE 9,
        MaritalStatus CHAR(1) 10,
        Gender CHAR(1) 12
    )
    AS [result];

--New data source for external table, only till main container
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'nyc_taxi_src')
    CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_src
    WITH
    (    LOCATION = 'https://synapsestoragemanu.dfs.core.windows.net/taxi-data'
    );

--Check external data source
SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources


--CSV with parser version 2.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format  
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '2.0' )   
      );

--CSV with parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='csv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );

--TSV file format with parser version 2.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='tsv_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format  
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '2.0' )   
      );

--TSV file format with parser version 1.0
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='tsv_file_format_pv1')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format_pv1 
  WITH (  
      FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
      FORMAT_OPTIONS (  
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'  
      , STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
      , First_Row = 2
      , USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE 
      , Encoding = 'UTF8'
      , PARSER_VERSION = '1.0' )   
      );


--parquet with SnappyCodec compression
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='parquet_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format  
  WITH (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,  
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'  
       );

--Delta with SnappyCodec compression (Delta is parquet with json log)
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name ='delta_file_format')
  CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format  
  WITH (  
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA,  
        DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'  
       );

--Check external file format
SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats

--Create External table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.taxi_zone
    (   location_id SMALLINT ,
        borough VARCHAR(15) ,
        zone VARCHAR(50) ,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) )  
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'Data/taxi_zone.csv',  
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
            FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
            REJECT_VALUE = 10,
            REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/taxi_zone'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

--Create calendar table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.calendar') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.calendar
    (
        date_key        INT,
        date            DATE,
        year            SMALLINT,
        month           TINYINT,
        day             TINYINT,
        day_name        VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year     SMALLINT,
        week_of_month   TINYINT,
        week_of_year    TINYINT,
        month_name      VARCHAR(10),
        year_month      INT,
        year_week       INT
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Data/calendar.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/calendar'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.calendar;

--Create vendor table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.vendor') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.vendor
    (
        vendor_id       TINYINT,
        vendor_name     VARCHAR(50)
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Data/vendor.csv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = csv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/vendor'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.vendor;

--Create trip type table with TSV
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_type') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_type
    (
        trip_type       TINYINT,
        trip_type_desc  VARCHAR(50)
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Data/trip_type.tsv',  
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,  
        FILE_FORMAT = tsv_file_format_pv1,
        REJECT_VALUE = 10,
        REJECTED_ROW_LOCATION = 'rejections/trip_type'
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.trip_type;

--Trip data green with Parquet
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_csv') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_csv
    (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Data/trip_data_green_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,   
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    );

SELECT * FROM bronze.trip_data_green_csv;  


-- Create delta table
IF OBJECT_ID('bronze.trip_data_green_delta') IS NOT NULL
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE bronze.trip_data_green_delta
    (
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )  
    WITH (
        LOCATION = 'Data/trip_data_green_delta',
        DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,   
        FILE_FORMAT = delta_file_format
    );

select * from bronze.trip_data_green_delta;    

-- Create view using json
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS bronze.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_rate_code
AS
SELECT rate_code_id, rate_code
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'Data/rate_code.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
  ) AS rate_code
  CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
  WITH(
      rate_code_id TINYINT,
      rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
  )
GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_rate_code;

CREATE VIEW bronze.vw_stock_prices
AS
SELECT 
symbol,stock_date,open_amt,high_amt,close_amt,volume
FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'raw_data/json/Stock_Prices.json/**',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'stock_prices_src',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
)
WITH
(
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS payment_type
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH(
        symbol VARCHAR(5),
        stock_date DATE '$.date',
        open_amt DECIMAL(18,2) '$.open',
        high_amt DECIMAL(18,2) '$.high',
        low_amt  DECIMAL(18,2) '$.low',
        close_amt DECIMAL(18,2) '$.close',
        volume INT
)
GO

SELECT * FROM bronze.vw_stock_prices
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE silver.usp_silver_calendar
AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.calendar') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar;

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar
        WITH
        (
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            LOCATION = 'silver/calendar',
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
    AS
    SELECT *
    FROM bronze.calendar;

END;

GO

AS
BEGIN
    IF OBJECT_ID('silver.taxi_zone') IS NOT NULL
        DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone;

    CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
        WITH
        (
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_taxi_src,
            LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
            FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
        )
    AS
    SELECT *
    FROM bronze.taxi_zone;

END;

CREATE DATABASE project_synapse;
USE project_synapse;
ALTER DATABASE project_synapse COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE project_data_csv
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://project-data@synapsestorageproject6.dfs.core.windows.net/csv'
)

--Added data types and renamed columns using indexes
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Stock_Prices.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'project_data_csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        symbol VARCHAR(5) 1,
        stock_date DATE 2,
        open_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 3,
        high_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 4,
        low_amt  DECIMAL(18,2) 5,
        close_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 6,
        volume INT 7
    )
    AS [result];
    
--Which date in the sample saw the largest overall trading volume?
SELECT
    TOP 1
    stock_date, sum(volume) as total_volume
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Stock_Prices.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'project_data_csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        symbol VARCHAR(5) 1,
        stock_date DATE 2,
        open_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 3,
        high_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 4,
        low_amt  DECIMAL(18,2) 5,
        close_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 6,
        volume BIGINT
    )
    AS [result]
    GROUP BY stock_date
    ORDER BY total_volume DESC;
    
--On which date did Amazon (AMZN) see the most volatility, measured by the difference between the high and low price?
SELECT
    top 1
    symbol, stock_date, high_amt, low_amt, open_amt, close_amt, DIFFERENCE(high_amt, low_amt) as amt_diff
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'Stock_Prices.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'project_data_csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
    WITH (
        symbol VARCHAR(5) 1,
        stock_date DATE 2,
        open_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 3,
        high_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 4,
        low_amt  DECIMAL(18,2) 5,
        close_amt DECIMAL(18,2) 6,
        volume BIGINT
    )
    AS [result] 
    WHERE symbol = 'AMZN'
    ORDER BY amt_diff DESC;

CREATE TABLE VehicleTollBooth
(
    Make VARCHAR(100),
    Model VARCHAR(100),
    VehicleType INT,
    State VARCHAR(20),
    TollAmount INT
)

SELECT State, TollAmount FROM VehicleTollBooth;

source: ### Notebook to create aggregated gold tables

%%sql

-- Create database

CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS sales_ldw_spark
LOCATION 'abfss://data@ap203synapsestorage.dfs.core.windows.net/gold';

# Read the silver data to be processed. 
sales_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/fact_internet_sales") 
customer_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/dim_customer") 
employee_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/dim_employee") 
geography_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/dim_geography") 
product_df = spark.read.parquet(f"{silver_folder_path}/dim_product")

# Perform the required aggregations
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

sales_agg_df = sales_df \
                .groupBy("CustomerKey","Year","Month") \
                .agg(round(sum("SalesAmount"), 2).alias("Revenue"), \
                round(sum("ProductStandardCost"), 2).alias("Cost"), \
                (sum("SalesAmount")-sum("ProductStandardCost")).alias("Profit"), \
                (sum("SalesAmount")-sum("ProductStandardCost")/sum("SalesAmount")).alias("ProfitMargin"))

# Write the aggregated data to the gold table for consumption
sales_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("Year", "Month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("sales_ldw_spark.sales_agg")
customer_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("Year", "Month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("sales_ldw_spark.customer_agg")
employee_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").format("parquet").saveAsTable("sales_ldw_spark.employee_agg")
product_agg_df.write.mode("overwrite").partitionBy("Year", "Month").format("parquet").saveAsTable("sales_ldw_spark.product_agg")
